Alaris.LuaEngine.LuaEngine Class Reference

Class used to load Lua script files. This script engine is an optional one and can be disabled by commenting a single line of code. More...

Detailed Description

Class used to load Lua script files. This script engine is an optional one and can be disabled by commenting a single line of code.
